about_the_game:
"Re;quartz Raid" PDF version of the official game guide book!

All illustrations are recorded in full color!
Completely covering the game information, it is a volume full of 116 pages!
(Text is in Japanese only)






Recorded content

○ Chapter 1 Characters
・All character profiles with default settings
・Character commentary dialogue by the person in charge of the scenario and the person in charge of the key animation

○ Chapter 2 strategy & story
・Complete game capture chart
・All root illustrations ・ED commentary

○ Chapter 3 Setting collection
・Commentary on the background of the city and the organization
・ Family crest + each house concept
・Each glossary list
・ OP animation charge: RIRI Yamashita interview + OP original picture posted
・Music: All vocal songs by Yuki Saito ・Explanation of songs performed by Konoe Akira

○ Chapter 4 Comments
・Main character spoiler premise round-table discussion
・ Contribution of illustrations drawn by the following staff
Original picture/character design: Hana/Still Coloring: Hata/OP video: RIRI Yamashita/Package design: Non Ohno

etc...
